title: Pilate's Cross
description: "I recommend this book to adult readers looking for a simple murder mystery to finish in few hours. If you like this book, then there is an entire series for you to enjoy. Happy reading!" -- OnlineBookClub.orgJohn Pilate needed a fresh start, but what he got was a college town rife with deadly secrets. Pilate finds himself unraveling a dark mystery surrounding the long-standing cold case of a college campus murder-suicide. With the odds stacked against him and a conspiracy threatening to kill him, Pilate must risk it all to set things right.In this pulse-pounding tale where every second counts and every revelation shocks, immerse yourself in a world where tranquility is deceitful, and every quiet corner echoes with secrets waiting to be unearthed.
author: J. Alexander Greenwood
